website_summaries.verdict: This ultra-long rope is a fantastic option for both older children and competitive adults.
pros: High-quality rope works well for gym class and parties
Looped ends provide anchor tuggers with extra stability and grip
cons: Material breaks down when exposed to water

customer_reviews.title: Bringing Old School Back
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for our youth department. With so many video games out now, many of the kids didn't even know what this rope was for. But, after they found out what it was for, they were hooked. Please, let me know if this review helped you! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Extraordinaire!

customer_reviews.title: Over-all okay product.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I had with the rope is that the ends are braided together and I didn't know how to get them apart. The product needs to come to me "ready to use" and not "needs assembling". But it is a heavy rope and has the center marking.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Boy Scout event for field games. Scouts loved it!!! Strong trope but soft to touch and non-abrasive. Did not need gloves. Perfect tug of war rope. I purchased the 100' length.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Good rope for the price and function
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a company event. It was perfect. We gave everyone gloves to wear if they wanted to. The rope is rough and tends to fray slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Cory C.

customer_reviews.title: Good rope, not for moisture/rainy environment.s
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our cub scout pack. The boys really loved it. I wish I had known that any amount of moisture makes this rope disintegrate. Mine is holding up, but I have to be extra careful where we use it. Of course, the scouts want to pull across a mud bog each time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Nut

customer_reviews.title: Great tug of war rope
customer_reviews.text: Great tug of war rope. Purchased for my school. Durable as well. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend without gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you want to cut your hands yo pieces using it.
customer_reviews.author: jene

customer_reviews.title: strong and sturdy, but rougher than expected
customer_reviews.text: The rope is very strong and sturdy but much rougher than expected. Also, little flakes fall off it. Yet, it didn't give anybody a rug burn at our company's picnic, although our teams tried for 6 rounds to beat each other.
customer_reviews.author: Huber

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: Ok quality, I used them 10 times still holding up. 12 on each side. High school age.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: It has been used several times and still in great condition. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: This is my second year using the rope since purchased. It has been used several times and still in great condition. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Saga

customer_reviews.title: Held up. Only complaint is the loop that makes ...
customer_reviews.text: Held up. Only complaint is the loop that makes the anchor on each end has a tendency to undo and the tape used to keep it from fraying came off.
customer_reviews.author: MRSH

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used one field day. Some fraying noted. Looks very well used after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M Bade

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the mud and rain
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to watch a "live" tug o war
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a rope should but didn't have a middle indicator
customer_reviews.text: Works like a rope should but didn't have a middle indicator, which just gave me a extra job before using it.
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tug of war with this rope... very heavy duty...
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: College Kid Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a college beach retreat. Held up well for a days use - may not last more than a couple years - but great for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: A picnic without a tug-o-war is just not a picnic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rope for a church picnic. It was me against several kids at my church. And man was it fun raising their hopes up and crushing them. After my victory, I did a quick victory lap around them while bellowing out a war cry. That day was one of the best days of my life so far. Anyways, good rope which held out nicely. Although a bit rough.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: The rope arrived completely dirty and filled with bugs or something...I refused to touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Moldy rope
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with MOLD!! And it smelled terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rope was perfect for our staff development day! Durable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, very sturdy, easy on the hands
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a work event and we even had a boss in a suit and tie who used it and didn't complain!
customer_reviews.author: RolLM

customer_reviews.title: ... Easter celebration and the kids (and even some adults) loved it! Good length and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this at our Easter celebration and the kids (and even some adults) loved it! Good length and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Samie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the rope is good but you have to wear gloves.
customer_reviews.author: DEBBIE R.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Highlight of our picnic, everyone loved it! Very strong, well made, liked how the halfway point was embedded in the cord. Very fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: lala

customer_reviews.title: kids and adults enjoyed the rope
customer_reviews.text: used the rope for fall festival games. kids and adults enjoyed the rope. easy on hands, good length and size rope does have an odor to it... i let it air out for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J

product_meta.title: US Games Economy Tug-O-War Rope
feature_bullets: Use in gym classes, rec centers or on playgrounds to promote teamwork and friendly competition
Encourages children to work together as a team to pull the opposing team to the ground
Top-grade manila rope stands up to intense pulling movements and strong grips by players
Braided and looped ends for the anchor person, 72" loop

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
